mapper.select: select s.swnumber,s.swname,s.swversion,s.swtype,es.patch_percent,es.equipmentid=#{equipmentid} as 'equipmentid' from tb_sw s left join tb_equipsw es on s.swnumber=es.swnumber where s.swtype='표준SW' group by s.swname order by s.swnumber asc

select s.swnumber,s.swname,s.swversion,s.swtype,es.patch_percent,es.equipmentid=#{equipmentid} as 'equipmentid' from tb_sw s left join tb_equipsw es on s.swnumber=es.swnumber where s.swtype='Explorer' group by s.swversion order by s.swnumber asc

select s.swnumber,s.swname,s.swversion,s.swtype,es.patch_percent,es.equipmentid=#{equipmentid} as 'equipmentid' from tb_sw s left join tb_equipsw es on s.swnumber=es.swnumber where s.swtype='OS' group by s.swname order by s.swnumber asc
